arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActorDamager, idActorDamaged)
	
-- Convo if the player attacks first, enable AI.
	ShuffleTable(tBandits)
	for i, idBandit in ipairs(tBandits) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idBandit) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idBandit) then
			if bNPCSpoke == false then
				Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONVO_ALERT, idBandit)
				bNPCSpoke = true
			end
			if not (idBandit == idWelcomer) then
				Hydra.ActorTriggerPhaseJump(idBandit)
			end
			Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idBandit, true)	
		end
	end
end

function Start(idActor, fRange, idActorDetector)

-- Convo telling the player they fell for the trap. Initiating combat after.
	ShuffleTable(tBandits)
	for i, idBandit in ipairs(tBandits) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idBandit) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idBandit) then
			if bNPCSpoke == false then
				Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONVO_MOCK, idBandit)
				bNPCSpoke = true
			end
			if not (idBandit == idWelcomer) then
				Hydra.ActorTriggerPhaseJump(idBandit)
			end
			Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idBandit, true)	
		end
	end
	
end

function Start(idActor, fRange, idActorDetector)
	
-- Banter to lure the player closer
	Hydra.ActorFaceActor(idActorDetector, idActor)
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idActorDetector) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idActorDetector) then
		Hydra.QActorAnim(idActorDetector, S_ENEMY_WAVE)
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONVO_LURE, idActorDetector)
	end
	
end

function Start(idActor, fRange, idActorDetector)

-- Banter heard from a distance informing the player something is there.
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idActorDetector) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idActorDetector) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_BANTER, idActorDetector)
	end
end

function Start(idActorKiller, szGroup)
	
-- Add a small pause between waves.	
	Hydra.Wait(1)	
	
	-- Enable Wave 2
	if nWaveCounter == 2 then
		for i, idSpawner in ipairs(tWave2) do
			if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSpawner) then
				Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, false)
			end
		end
		nWaveCounter = nWaveCounter + 1
	elseif nWaveCounter >= 3 then
		-- Enable Elite on Wave 4
		if nWaveCounter == 4 then
			Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idElite, false)
		end
	-- Enable Wave 3
		for i, idSpawner in ipairs(tWave3) do
			if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSpawner) then
				Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, false)
				Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdate(idSpawner)
			end
		end
		nWaveCounter = nWaveCounter + 1
	end
end

-- Start Wave 1 and the wave counter.
for i, idSpawner in ipairs(tWave1) do
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSpawner) then
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, false)
	end
end
nWaveCounter = nWaveCounter + 1

arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(szGroup)

--Spawn reward chest
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idChest, false)

end

arCallbackSets.unk_98d4504:
-- Sets the DRLG designer variable so the chest encounter spawns the correct one.
	Hydra.SetGameVariableNumeric("DE_ChestRewardRare", 1)

unk_993f312:
bNPCSpoke = false
nWaveCounter = 1

-- Welcomer Setup
	Hydra.ActorSetAnimSetOverride(idWelcomer, S_ANIMSET_ENEMY_TYPE_01)
	Hydra.ActorSetIdleAnim(idWelcomer, S_ENEMY_IDLE)
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idWelcomer, false)

-- Initial Setup (Using marker set overrides to change between Bandit and Knight)
	for i, idGroup01 in ipairs(tStartingGroup01) do
		Hydra.ActorSetAnimSetOverride(idGroup01, S_ANIMSET_ENEMY_TYPE_01)
		UF_SittingAnims(idGroup01,S_ENEMY_TYPE_01_SIT_KNEES, S_ENEMY_TYPE_01_SIT_CROSS)
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idGroup01, false)
	end

	for i, idGroup02 in ipairs(tStartingGroup02) do
		Hydra.ActorSetAnimSetOverride(idGroup02, S_ANIMSET_ENEMY_TYPE_02)
		UF_SittingAnims(idGroup02,S_ENEMY_TYPE_02_SIT_KNEES, S_ENEMY_TYPE_02_SIT_CROSS)
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idGroup02, false)
	end
